Uses of Enum Class
cards.Suit

Packages that use Suit
Package
Description
cards
This package includes classes used for the implementation of cards, hands and decks.
game
This package contains classes used for implementation of different game modes (Simulation and Debug) and variants (DoubleBonus 10/7).
